DOC.brief_summary: This study is Phase 4 trial which evaluates the safety and efficacy of 2% Lidocaine HCl with different epinephrine concentration in patients undergoing surgical extraction of impacted lower third molars
DOC.brief_title: Trial to Evaluate the Efficacy on Local Anesthesia and Safety of 2% Lidocaine HCl With Different Epinephrine Concentration in Patients Undergoing Surgical Extraction of Impacted Lower Third Molars
DOC.criteria: Age over 19 Physical grade 1 or 2 by American Society of Anesthesiologists (ASA) Mesioangular or horizontal angulation categorized by winter classification Allergy or hypersensitivity about the investigated products Any infection or edema during the extraction The following patients: clotting disorder, hyperthyroidism, arteriosclerosis, cardiac insufficiency, other cardiovascular disorders Pregnancy or breastfeeding Any conditions that the investigator considers not to appropriate for this study
